articles.title: American man to lose penis after deploying foam inside urethra during sex | news.com.au — Australia's leading news site - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: A US man who accidentally sprayed expanding foam into his urethra in a bid to treat his impotence may never be able to use his penis again, doctors have warned.
articles.content: A impotent man will likely never have sex again after turning to a home remedy to treat his condition, with dire consequences on his manhood.A US man who accidentally sprayed expanding foam into his … [+2515 chars]

articles.title: Niagara Falls to be lit up in white tonight to honour Betty White's 100th birthday - CBC.ca
articles.description: The Horseshoe and American falls will be lit up white Monday night to honour what would have been iconic actor Betty White’s 100th birthday.
articles.content:
For 15 minutes on Monday night, Niagara Falls will pay tribute to legendary actor Betty White by lighting up both the Canadian and American waterfalls  in white, of course.
